name: Burton's Bananas
description:
Young Burton is given the task of collecting banana fruits from the jungle by his village elder. Reluctantly, he brought a large blue box as means to collect as many yellow bananas as possible. At the same time, he must avoid the dangerous red bananas which can cause sickness.
The goal of the game is to collect as many yellow bananas as possible within the time limit. It is made with Unity.

Credits:

Story by Nasran Salleh
Art by royalty-free images and Nasran Salleh
Music by Giuseppe Verdi
